name: Sherlock Holmes Faces Death
summary_text: During WWII several murders occur at a convalescent home where Dr. Watson has volunteered his services. He summons Holmes for help and the master detective proceeds to solve the crime from ...                See full summary »

name: The Photograph
summary_text: A series of intertwining love stories set in the past and in the present.

name: A Man Called Ahok
summary_text: Depicts the life of the titular former governor of Jakarta before he ran for office, Ahok learned a lot about discipline from his father who ran a mining business in Belitung while dealing with various corrupt people.

name: Bombón: El Perro
summary_text: In Patagonia, a mechanic who dreams of a different life starts to think big after his adopted pup wins first prize at a local dog show.

name: The Deadly Spawn
summary_text: Alien creatures invade a small town and four teenagers, along with a young boy, attempt to escape from them.

name: Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
summary_text: Madea, Bam, and Hattie venture to a haunted campground and the group must run for their lives when monsters, goblins, and the boogeyman are unleashed.

name: The Bachelor Weekend
summary_text: A bachelor party weekend in the great outdoors takes some unexpected detours.

name: La Llorona
summary_text: An aging paranoid war criminal, protected by his faithful wife, faces death while being haunted by the ghosts of his past.

name: The Plagues of Breslau
summary_text: Every day at 6 pm a serial killer kills a different person. Police officer Helena Rus decides to find the killer by researching about 18th century history of the city.

name: Leily Ba Man Ast
summary_text: During the war with Iraq, an absurd set of events has an Iranian documentary cinematographer seemingly unable to get out of a dangerous project documenting the war.

name: A Friend of Mine
summary_text: An introverted insurance executive at a car rental service is annoyed by his hyperactive, garrulous coworker, but the two end up becoming friends.

name: Noise
summary_text: A man who is being driven crazy by the noise in New York City decides to take vigilante action against it.

name: The Spider Woman
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of so-called "pajama suicides". He knows the female villain behind them is as cunning as Moriarty and as venomous as a spider.

name: Fear and Trembling
summary_text: A Belgian woman looks back on her year at a Japanese corporation in Tokyo in 1990. She is Amélie, born in Japan, living there until age 5. After college graduation, she returns with a ...                See full summary »

name: Dia
summary_text: Dia takes three years to confess her feelings to Rohith but after a terrible accident, she is told he does not survive. Later, when she starts seeing Adi, she finds out that Rohith is still alive.

name: Riff-Raff
summary_text: The story of Stevie, a construction worker, and his girlfriend, an unemployed pop singer, serves to show the living conditions of the British poor class.

name: Abominable
summary_text: A man, crippled in a climbing accident, returns to his cabin in the woods as part of his rehabilitation, but he wasn't prepared for the immanent onslaught.

name: Minnie and Moskowitz
summary_text: A museum curator falls in love with a crazy parking attendant.

name: Çiplak Vatandas
summary_text: A guy under economic pressure has a nervous breakdown and one night suddenly starts to run naked, which makes him an overnight sensation.

name: The Golden Bowl
summary_text: A man marries an heiress for her money even though he is actually in love with her friend.

name: Loch Ness
summary_text: A scientist tries to prove the existence of the Loch Ness monster.

name: Mikey and Nicky
summary_text: Nicky is on the run from the mob, and he turns to old pal Mikey for help.

name: Raining Stones
summary_text: This Ken Loach film tells the story of a man devoted to his family and his religion. Proud, though poor, Bob wants his little girl to have a beautiful (and costly) brand-new dress for her ...                See full summary »

name: Savage Streets
summary_text: A teenage vigilante seeks revenge on a group of violent thugs who raped her handicapped sister and killed her best friend.

name: Escape
summary_text: Signe, spared from death to produce a child, befriends a little girl, Frigg, and escapes from the camp.

name: Inadequate People
summary_text: Adequacy is relative. Vitalik, the main character of the movie, seems to be pretty normal. With a respectable office job, a comfy little dwelling and a personal couch doctor, Vitalik looks ...                See full summary »

name: Samson
summary_text: After losing the love of his life to a cruel Philistine Prince, a young Hebrew with supernatural strength defends his people, sacrificing everything to avenge his love, his people, and God.

name: Ticks
summary_text: A group of troubled teenagers are led by social workers on a California wilderness retreat, not knowing that the woods they are camping in have become infested by mutated, blood-sucking ticks.

name: White Lightning
summary_text: An ex con teams up with federal agents to help them with breaking up a moonshine ring.

name: Richard III
summary_text: Shakespeare's powerful tale of the wicked deformed King and his conquests, both on the battlefield and in the boudoir.

name: Sperm Whale
summary_text: It's about an Iranian man who tells his life story from childhood to now and his love.

name: I'm Reed Fish
summary_text: Reed Fish's life turns into chaos when a high school crush returns to Mud Meadows on the eve of his marriage to the small town's sweetheart.

name: Mean Guns
summary_text: 100 people, who have betrayed The Syndicate, are gathered in a prison opening the next day. They are given weapons and 6 hours to kill each other. The 3 remaining share $10,000,000.

name: Stations of the Cross
summary_text: Fourteen-year-old Maria is a fundamentalist Catholic, living her life in a modern fashion, yet her heart belongs to Jesus. She wants to be a saint and go to heaven. No one, not even a nice boy she meets, can stop her in this goal.

name: Børning
summary_text: The illegal sports car race "Street legal" goes 2000 kilometers through Norway from Oslo to North Cape, and Roy has been challenged to participate. At the same time, he has to look after his daughter.

name: Raavan
summary_text: A bandit leader kidnaps the wife of the policeman who killed his sister, but later falls in love with her.

name: Master of the Flying Guillotine
summary_text: After his students are killed by the One Armed Boxer, a vengeful and blind Kung Fu expert travels to a village where a martial arts contest is being held and vows to behead every one armed man he comes across.

name: Landline
summary_text: In 1995, a teenager living with her sister and parents in Manhattan discovers that her father is having an affair.

name: The Party 2
summary_text: Vulnerable and impressionable teenage girl continues to experience sorrows and joys of adult life.

name: Is Paris Burning?
summary_text: August 1944. The Allies are approaching Paris and residence groups within the city start to plan an uprising against the Germans. However, Hitler wants the city destroyed if it looks like the Allies will take it.

name: Something in the Air
summary_text: In the months after the heady weeks of May '68, a group of young Europeans search for a way to continue the revolution believed to be just beginning.

name: Big Eden
summary_text: Big Eden is a small, fictional northwestern Montana town.

name: Sherlock Holmes and the Voice of Terror
summary_text: When a Nazi saboteur jeeringly predicts to the nation new depredations via the radio 'Voice of Terror', the Homeland Security Inner Council summons Sherlock Holmes (Basil Rathbone) to help ...                See full summary »

name: In the Aisles
summary_text: Christian begins to work as a shelf stacker at a supermarket and finds himself in a new, unknown world: the long aisles, the bustle at the checkouts, the forklifts.

summary_text: The Emmy Award-winning Robot Chicken returns with its third send-up of the Star Wars universe! In this all-new hour-long special, four very different characters -- Emperor Palpatine, Darth ...                See full summary »

name: Lisa and the Devil
summary_text: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an ancient fresco.

name: Dhaka Attack
summary_text: An anonymous criminal gang plot a series attack in Dhaka City and three young police officers work on this.

name: One Piece Film: Gold
summary_text: The Straw Hat Pirates come to Gran Tesoro, the richest ship in the world.

name: Scotland, Pa.
summary_text: A modernized retelling of "MacBeth" set in 1970s suburban Pennsylvania. Joe McBeth, an unambitious hamburger stand employee, is driven to success by his scheming wife.

name: The Prisoner of Zenda
summary_text: An Englishman on a Ruritarian holiday must impersonate the king when the rightful monarch, a distant cousin, is drugged and kidnapped.

summary_text: When a village belle's brother is killed by a bandit, she vows revenge and enlists the help of two truckers-cum-theatre artists in her mission.

name: Ponette
summary_text: A four-year-old girl tries to come to terms with the sudden death of her mother.

name: Sugar Hill
summary_text: A drug dealer tries to get out of the life and start anew with his girlfriend, but the transition is tragically difficult.

name: The Legend II

name: Bill Burr: Why Do I Do This?
summary_text: In his first stand-up special, Comedian Bill Burr takes aim at the stuff that drives us crazy, political correctness gone haywire, and girlfriends; or as he calls them, "relentless psycho robots."

name: Chopsticks
summary_text: A gifted but insecure woman is in for a transformative experience when she enlists an enigmatic con to help recover her stolen car from a Mumbai thug.

name: Voyna
summary_text: During the bloody war in Chechnya, a British couple and two Russian soldiers are taken hostage by Chechen rebels. Two of the hostages are then released to bring the money for the British woman who is forced to wait for the ransom.

name: How About Adolf?

name: Slack Bay
summary_text: In the early 20th century, at the Pas de Calais, people mysteriously disappear as Ma Loute, son of the local fishermen family, and Billie, daughter of the snobbish Van Peteghems, fall in love each other.

name: Home
summary_text: Life for an isolated rural family is upended when a major highway next to their property, constructed 10 years before but apparently abandoned, is finally opened.

name: Gardens of the Night
summary_text: After being abducted as children, and suffering years of abuse, a teenage boy and girl find themselves living on the street.

name: London Dreams
summary_text: The story revolves around two childhood friends Arjun and Munnu who find a way to get from a small village in India to Wembley as Rock stars, having overcome their personalities.

name: Minha Mãe é uma Peça: O Filme
summary_text: After another spat with her kids, Dona Hermínia decides to take some time off from them and hides away in her aunt's house, where she reminisces about her kids in an age when they still needed her.

name: Chop Shop
summary_text: Alejandro, a resourceful street orphan on the verge of adolescence, lives and works in an auto-body repair shop in a sprawling junkyard on the outskirts of Queens, New York. In this chaotic world of adults, Alejandro struggles to make a better life for himself and his sixteen-year-old sister.

name: Children Shouldn't Play with Dead Things
summary_text: Six friends in a theatrical troupe dig up a corpse on an abandoned island to use in a mock Satanic rite. It backfires with deadly consequences.

name: Dear Ex
summary_text: A teenage boy and his mother are further driven apart when they find out that his father's life insurance policy is to be received by his lover.

name: The Hatton Garden Job
summary_text: A criminal gang of old timers attempt to pull off the largest burglary in English history at an underground safe deposit facility with an estimated value of £200 million.

name: Across the Hall

name: The Cruel Sea
summary_text: The World War II adventures of a British convoy escort ship and its officers.

name: Peterloo
summary_text: The story of the 1819 Peterloo Massacre where British forces attacked a peaceful pro-democracy rally in Manchester.

name: Fyra nyanser av brunt
summary_text: An eccentric millionaire dies at a manor in Dalarna in Sweden, leaving behind three sons and a mistress. One of four parallel stories about parents and children. Four sides of Sweden. Four shades of brown.

name: Bellissima
summary_text: A woman from the lower class desperately tries to get her daughter into the movies.

name: Stargirl
summary_text: An unassuming high schooler finds himself inexplicably drawn to the free-spirited new girl, whose unconventional ways change how they see themselves - and each other.

summary_text: The showman who brought Kong to New York returns to Skull Island and finds Kong's son, a spunky 12-footer with a winning personality and his dad's awesome strength.

name: Lassie
summary_text: A family in financial crisis is forced to sell Lassie, their beloved dog. Hundreds of miles away from her true family, Lassie escapes and sets out on a journey home.

name: Being Charlie
summary_text: A would-be governor's addicted son goes down the long, rough road of rehab, fighting against recovery every inch of the way.

name: Keep Watching
summary_text: A family become imprisoned in their home by intruders who force them to play a life and death game where the mysterious rules become clear as the night unfolds.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
summary_text: A newlywed man on his honeymoon has second thoughts about his marriage and falls for a different woman.

name: The Railway Children
summary_text: After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

name: Citizen Gangster
summary_text: WWII vet Eddie Boyd is torn between providing for his young family and an unfulfilled dream of becoming a Hollywood star. He discovers a way to do both, but his dream leads him down a path of danger and tragedy.

name: Sex and Breakfast
summary_text: Two young couples take a swing at handling their relationship problems through psychologist-prescribed partner-swapping.

name: Spiders
summary_text: After a Soviet space station crashes into a New York City subway tunnel, a species of venomous spiders is discovered, and soon they mutate to gigantic proportions and wreak havoc on the city.

name: Victim
summary_text: A young man finds himself held captive by a mysterious doctor and his brutish henchman.

name: All Ladies Do It
summary_text: A happily married 24-year-old woman who experiences an inexplicable, rather restless craving to finally live her life intensely, retells her extra-marital escapades to her husband intending to spice up their marriage.

name: Heart of Dragon
summary_text: Tat, ex SWAT turned CID cop in HK, has a 29 y.o. Disabled brother, behaving like the small boys, he plays with, always getting into trouble. Tat struggles to care for him - at the expense of his cute girlfriend and dreams.

name: A Wish For Christmas
summary_text: Sara Thomas is the type of woman who prefers to sit on the sidelines at work, but when her big idea for a Christmas initiative is stolen, she makes a wish to Santa that she'll finally have ...                See full summary »

name: The Zookeeper
summary_text: In the midst of a devastating civil war in an Eastern European country, a disillusioned ex-Communist is left behind to take care of the animals in the capital's zoological gardens until a U.N. rescue force arrives.

name: Valentin
summary_text: An 8-year-old boy, raised by his grandmother, is surrounded by problems in his family he finds only himself capable of solving.

name: The Cakemaker
summary_text: A German pastry maker travels to Jerusalem in search of the wife and son of his dead lover.

name: Nautanki Saala!
summary_text: Ram, a successful theatre artist, saves Mandar from committing suicide. He then ends up developing a special bond with Mandar and even helps solve his problems.

name: Sans Kapiyi Kirinca
summary_text: A Turkish family's journey to Cuba.

name: Crown for Christmas
summary_text: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, Allie reluctantly accepts a temporary gig as the governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful family in Europe that lives in a castle.

name: When Did You Last See Your Father?
summary_text: The story of a son's conflicting memories of his dying father.

name: An Easy Girl
summary_text: Naima is 16 and lives in Cannes. She has given herself the summer to choose what she wants to do with her life. Then her cousin Sofia, with her alluring lifestyle, arrives to spend the holidays with her.

summary_text: After killing a lot of bad guys including Armenians, Vigilante is wanted by the Armenian mafia boss, who gets help - but so does Vigilante.

name: Choose

summary_text: The action comedy is set in 1944. Hitler appears in it as physically and mentally destroyed person who takes the advice of Goebbels in the actor-teacher of Jewish concentration camp for ...                See full summary »

summary_text: A small-time crook becomes convinced he is an angel after a traumatic incident and resolves to perform the work of one.

name: The Incredible Journey
summary_text: The story of three pets, a cat and two dogs, who lose their owners when they are all on vacation. Can they find their way home?

name: Solsidan
summary_text: In this movie adaptation of the TV-Show by the same name, we join the three couples in a comedy about divorces, love, child longing, weird parents and unwritten bathing rules in Torekov.

summary_text: A bitter ad executive who has reached his breaking point, finds himself in a mental institution where his career actually begins to thrive with the help of the hospital's patients.

name: The Canyon
summary_text: A survival story about a honeymooning couple who get lost in the wide expanse of the Grand Canyon.

name: This Man Must Die

summary_text: Two Britons, Hengist and Horsa, are captured and enslaved by invading Romans and taken to Rome. One of their first encounters in Rome leaves Hengist being mistaken for a fighter, and gets drafted into the Royal Guard to protect Caesar.

name: The Protector

name: Teacher's Pet
summary_text: A hard-nosed newspaper editor poses as a night school student in order to woo a journalism teacher who cannot stand him.

name: Court
summary_text: When an aging activist is arrested, the lives of the accused, the lawyers, and the judge intertwine to reveal bigotry that underscores the judicial system.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
summary_text: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

name: Sergeant Rutledge
summary_text: Respected black cavalry Sergeant Brax Rutledge stands court-martial for raping and killing a white woman and murdering her father, his superior officer.

name: Heidi
summary_text: A plucky little orphan girl gets dumped abruptly into her gruff, hermit grandfather's care, then later gets retaken and delivered as a companion for an injured girl.

name: Tanna
summary_text: Set on a remote Pacific island, covered in rain forest and dominated by an active volcano, this heartfelt story, enacted by the Yakel tribe, tells of a sister's loyalty, a forbidden love affair and the pact between the old ways and the new.

name: Nokas
summary_text: The movie portrays Norway's most spectacular robbery, where 11 men occupied central Stavanger for twenty minutes and escaped with 57 million kroner (appx $10 million). A police officer was shot and killed.

name: Homecoming
summary_text: A jilted ex-girlfriend plots revenge after her former beau comes back to their hometown with a new lover.

name: Come Back to the 5 & Dime Jimmy Dean, Jimmy Dean

name: The Great Battle
summary_text: A historical film about the siege of Ansi Fortress and the epic eighty-eight day battle that Yang Man-chun and his Goguryeo troops fought against 500,000 invading Tang dynasty men to defend it.

name: Around the Bend
summary_text: A bitter, recently divorced man is goaded by his grandfather and son into going on a family road trip to reconcile with his estranged father.

name: Guns, Girls and Gambling
summary_text: 5 Elvis impersonators stay long after the contest playing poker, when a valuable mask is stolen from the Indian casino. Killers, incl. a sexy, blonde assassin, hunt down the Elvises to get the mask.

name: Diary of a Lost Girl
summary_text: After falling pregnant to a pharmacist and refusing to marry, a young woman is thrown from her home and sent to a strict girls' reform school.

name: Bhoot: Part One - The Haunted Ship

name: Kicks
summary_text: Brandon is a 15 year old whose dream is a pair of fresh Air Jordans. Soon after he gets his hands on them, they're stolen by a local hood, causing Brandon and his two friends to go on a dangerous mission through Oakland to retrieve them.

summary_text: With ABOUT ENDLESSNESS, Roy Andersson adds to his cinematic oeuvre with a reflection on human life in all its beauty and cruelty, its splendour and banality.

name: Juyuso seubgyuksageun
summary_text: Four disaffected youths rob a gas station but find their plans complicated and sidetracked before the night is through.

name: Little Indian, Big City

summary_text: A womanizing alcoholic writer, whose life seems to be falling apart at the seams, repeatedly finds himself in trouble of one sort or another with the law, ex-girlfriends, and jealous boyfriends.

name: My Big Night
summary_text: During the never-ending TV taping for a New Year's Eve program, peoples personal lives clash and eventually explode out into the open.

name: Treasure Raiders
summary_text: An American professor (Brand) teams up with a Russian biker (Nevsky) to search for historical treasures buried in and around Moscow.

summary_text: Longtime friends and local radio hosts Maggie and Jack fake it as a couple for their families and listeners in hopes of getting their show syndicated.

name: Godzilla Against MechaGodzilla
summary_text: A new Godzilla causes the JSDF to construct a cyborg countermeasure from the original monster's remains. The beast's restless soul is discovered to inhabit the machine as the pilot must learn to find value in her own life.

summary_text: An anthology of four short horror stories revolving around a mysterious antique shop owner and his antique pieces, each of which hides a deadly secret.

name: Cloud 9
summary_text: A snowboarder takes lessons from a former champion, inspiring him to reach for the stars once again.

name: Ah Nerede
summary_text: Three boys are having their higher education in Istanbul (!). In fact, they are messing around and dealing with radical politics, girls and gamble. However the oldest discovers love, and the three realize it is time for change

name: What Lies Below
summary_text: A 16 year-old girl returns home from camp and learns that her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry. A man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

summary_text: A reclusive, retired professor is faced with confronting modernity when a group of vulgar youths, led by an obnoxious marchesa, take up residence in his unused upper residence.

name: Listy do M.

summary_text: A city girl teams up with a tomboy to solve the mystery of Bear Mountain, Molly Morgan, and the buried treasure as well as learn about true friendships.

summary_text: The head of a major cosmetics company experiments on herself with a youth formula made from royal jelly extracted from wasps, but the formula's side effects have deadly consequences.

summary_text: A love triangle on a college campus between two young students who try to deny their feelings for each other. The entry of a lecturer who has a soft corner for the boy, changes things around.

name: Adu

name: D@bbe

name: La vérité si je mens!
summary_text: The sentimental and comedic adventures of Eddie, a non-Jew trying to pass as Jewish though totally ignorant of Jewish traditions, as he works in a Jewish community.

name: Another 9½ Weeks

summary_text: An evil ninja attempts to avenge his death from beyond the grave, by possessing an innocent woman's body.

name: Imperial Dreams
summary_text: A 21-year-old reformed gangster's devotion to his family and his future is put to the test when he is released from prison and returns to his old stomping grounds in Watts, Los Angeles.

name: Bent

name: Beyond Silence

name: Beneath
summary_text: A crew of coal miners becomes trapped 600 feet below ground after a disastrous collapse. As the air grows more toxic and time runs out, they slowly descend into madness and begin to turn on one another.

name: Immoral Tales
summary_text: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

name: À Nous la Liberté
summary_text: Seeking better life, two convicts escape from prison.

name: The Golem
summary_text: During an outbreak of a deadly plague, a mystical woman must save her tight-knit Jewish community from foreign invaders, but the entity she conjures to protect them is a far greater evil.

name: In a Glass Cage
summary_text: A former nazi child-killer is confined in an iron lung inside an old mansion after a suicide attempt. His wife hires him a full-time carer, a mysterious young man who is driven slowly mad by the old man's disturbing past.

name: The Abandoned
summary_text: The Confined is an intense and claustrophobic thriller that follows troubled Streak who, in a last-ditch effort at getting her life together, takes a job working nights as a security guard at an abandoned luxury apartment building.

name: More American Graffiti
summary_text: College graduates deal with Vietnam and other issues of the late 1960s.

name: That Hamilton Woman
summary_text: The story of courtesan and dance-hall girl Emma Hamilton, including her relationships with Sir William Hamilton and Admiral Horatio Nelson and her rise and fall, set during the Napoleonic Wars.

name: The Love Letter
summary_text: The life of a provincial town becomes stormy after the appearance of an anonymous love letter.

name: Fedora
summary_text: Down-on-his-luck Hollywood producer Barry 'Dutch' Detweiler attempts to lure Fedora, a famous but reclusive film actress, out of retirement.

name: The Incredible Melting Man
summary_text: An astronaut is transformed into a murderous gelatinous mass after returning from an ill-fated space voyage.

name: Rabid
summary_text: The quiet Rose works in women's fashion clothing, hoping to be a designer. A traffic accident damages her face. She gets experimental stem cell treatment, leaving her stronger and prettier than ever - but there's a side effect.

name: Turkish Ice-Cream
summary_text: The two Turks went to Australia. They provide their livelihood by selling ice-cream with a wheelbarrow and camel show in festivals. In 1915 they learned that there was a war in the country....                See full summary »

name: Head On
summary_text: A 19 year old Greek Australian youth struggles with his sexual identity and has one clumsy heterosexual and several homosexual encounters.

name: That Darn Cat
summary_text: A maid is kidnapped and scratches a message onto D.C. the cat's collar and when his owner Patti discovers this, she plays amateur detective with the help of D.C. to try to find the culprits.

name: Burglar
summary_text: A retired cop blackmails ex burglar Bernice into paying him $20,000 - thus burgling. Paid to get a dentist's jewelry back from her ex's apartment, someone murders the ex and Bernice is a suspect. She investigates.

name: Isle of the Dead
summary_text: On a Greek island during the 1912 war, several people are trapped by quarantine for the plague. If that isn't enough worry, one of the people, a superstitious old peasant woman, suspects ...                See full summary »

name: Remember Me, My Love
summary_text: In the dysfunctional Italian middle-class family Ristuccia, the middle-aged executive Carlo has a stalled life without passion, bored in his work and having a monotonous life with his wife ...                See full summary »

name: Metallica: S&M
summary_text: A live Metallica concert backed by a 80 piece symphony orchestra, conducted by Michael Kamen. Two songs are debuted, "- Human" and "No Leaf Clover". A documentary is included. It also was released on audio CD.

name: The Sunchaser
summary_text: Michael Reynolds is a rich oncologist who has a one hundred seventy-five thousand dollar sports car, a multi-million dollar house, and a new boost in his career. Brandon "Blue" Monroe is a ...                See full summary »

name: The Hi-Lo Country
summary_text: Two cowboys have their friendship tested when they fall for the same girl.

name: Under the Tree
summary_text: When Baldwin and Inga's next door neighbours complain that a tree in their backyard casts a shadow over their sundeck, what starts off as a typical spat between neighbours in the suburbs unexpectedly and violently spirals out of control.

name: Scorpio
summary_text: During the Cold War, the CIA orders free-lance operative Scorpio to assassinate his former CIA mentor Cross and a deadly cat-and-mouse game ensues.

name: The Other Side of Heaven
summary_text: John Groberg, a farm kid from Idaho Falls, crosses an ocean to become a missionary in the remote and exotic Tongan islands during the 1950s.

name: Little Lord Fauntleroy
summary_text: An American boy turns out to be the long-lost heir of a British fortune. He is sent to live with the cold and unsentimental Lord, who oversees the trust.

name: Saand Ki Aankh
summary_text: Both over the age of 60, Chandro Tomar and Prakashi Tomar inspire other women in India when they demonstrate their expert sharpshooting skills.

name: Step Sisters
summary_text: To get the college dean's backing for Harvard, Jamilah has to teach girls at a white sorority to step dance.

name: Not Safe for Work
summary_text: An office worker is trapped inside the building where a killer is on the loose.

name: Stealing Home
summary_text: Ex baseball player Billy comes home to receive his childhood darling's ashes (suicide). He reminisces.

name: Losin' It
summary_text: Set in 1965, four rowdy teenage guys travel to Tijuana, Mexico for a night of partying when they are joined by a heartbroken housewife who is in town seeking a quick divorce.

name: Kings Row
summary_text: The dark side and hypocrisy of provincial American life is seen through the eyes of five children as they grow to adulthood at the turn of the century.

name: The Scapegoat
summary_text: Set in 1952, as England prepares for the coronation, this movie tells the story of two very different men who have one thing in common - a face.

name: Cottage Country
summary_text: When a man accidentally kills his brother with an ax, his fiancée is determined not to let even murder stand in the way of their happiness.

name: In This World
summary_text: A refugee family is trying to reach more peaceful lands illegally inside trucks.

name: The Wedding Guest
summary_text: A story centered on a mysterious British Muslim man (Dev Patel) on his journey across Pakistan and India.

name: The Windmill
summary_text: Seven tourists with troubled pasts find themselves trapped at a satanic mill in rural Holland. As they're attacked for their sins one by one, the night becomes a fight for survival.

name: The Devil's Carnival
summary_text: Lost souls enter The Devil's Carnival, where they're each faced with the sins they committed during life.

name: Players
summary_text: Learning of a fortune in gold being secretly shipped to Romania, master thieves Charlie and Riya assemble a crack team to steal it.

name: The Last Shot
summary_text: A movie director-screenwriter finds a man to finance his latest project but soon discovers that the producer is actually an undercover FBI agent working on a mob sting operation.

name: Scooby-Doo! Curse of the Lake Monster
summary_text: School is out and the familiar Scooby gang are looking to enjoy a long vacation. However, sightings of a Lake Monster cause them to band together once again to solve yet another mystery.

name: Bastard Out of Carolina
summary_text: A mother and daughter find their lives adversely affected when a new man enters the picture. Will their family ever be what they expect?

name: Man's Best Friend
summary_text: A genetically engineered dog escapes from the science facility where it was created. A family takes it in unaware of its deadly instincts which soon emerge. The scientist who created the dog tries to find it before its too late.

name: The Miser
summary_text: An incredible miser fights against the whole world to multiply his wealth.

name: Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter
summary_text: Kung-Fu Action / Comedy / Horror / Musical about the second coming.

name: Posse
summary_text: In 1898 Cuba, five Buffalo Soldiers find a gold cache, desert and return to America where they help defend a black town from the KKK, all the while trying to avoid capture by lawmen and military authorities alike.

name: Three Ages
summary_text: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

name: Diamond Dust
summary_text: A man who works in a pharmacy as a part time job to aid his financial status finds out that his father has been exterminated by a savage brute and sought to avenge him, then unlocks a whole melancholic world of crime!

name: All Monsters Attack
summary_text: A latchkey child living in the industrial and polluted city of Kawasaki confronts his loneliness and bullies through his escapist dreams of Monster Island and friendship with Minilla.

name: Kyaa Kool Hain Hum 3
summary_text: A porn actor uses his fellow adult movie stars in creating a fake traditional family, in order to impress his girlfriend's conservative father.

name: Shottas
summary_text: Wayne and Biggs grow up together on the tough and dangerous streets of Kingston, Jamaica. Eventually moving to Miami, they begin a ruthless climb to the top of a criminal enterprise as they aggressively take control of the Jamaican mob.

name: The Man from Elysian Fields
summary_text: A failed novelist's inability to pay the bills strains relations with his wife and leads him to work at an escort service where he becomes entwined with a wealthy woman whose husband is a successful writer.

name: Tetsuo II: Body Hammer
summary_text: When metal-worshipping fanatics abduct his son, a father unleashes his dormant destructive power, as his naked rage transforms the once-feeble flesh into a grisly symbiosis of metal and tissue. Who dares to defy the ultimate body-hammer?

name: The Creeping Terror
summary_text: A newlywed sheriff tries to stop a shambling monster that has emerged from a spaceship to eat the citizens of an American town.

name: Zero Motivation
summary_text: A unit of female Israeli soldiers at a remote desert base bide their time as they count down the minutes until they can return to civilian life.

name: Fay Grim
summary_text: A ten-years-later continuation of Hal Hartley's "Henry Fool", where Fay Grim (Posey) is coerced by a CIA agent (Goldblum) to try and locate notebooks that belonged to her fugitive ex-husband (Ryan). Published in them is information that could compromises the security of the U.S., causing Fay to first head to Paris to fetch them ...

name: Nybyggarna
summary_text: A Swedish immigrant family struggle to establish a new life for themselves in the forest of Minnesota in the mid 19th Century.

name: The Truth About Love
summary_text: Drunk, Archie sends a valentine to his best friend's wife. She sends one to her husband. He hides it so she disguises herself as a slut. Will he cheat on his wife - with his wife? Let us see what happens.

name: Cingöz Recai
summary_text: A story of a thief, based on the novel of famous writer novelist Peyami Safa.

name: Tian di ying xiong
summary_text: A Chinese emissary is sent to the Gobi desert to execute a renegade soldier. When a caravan transporting a Buddhist monk and a valuable treasure is threatened by thieves, however, the two warriors might unite to protect the travelers.

name: The Cheyenne Social Club
summary_text: An aging cowboy finds to his embarrassment that the successful business he has inherited from his brother is actually a house of prostitution.

name: On the Milky Road
summary_text: A story that stretches across war, blossoming love and living as a recluse.

name: The Exorcism of Molly Hartley
summary_text: Taking place years after The Haunting of Molly Hartley, who now, as an adult, has fallen under the possession of an evil spirit and must be exorcised by a fallen priest before the devil completely takes her.

name: Baadshah
summary_text: Rama Rao fails to get a job with the police force due to his father's connections with a gangster. But when his brother is killed by the gangster, Rama Rao becomes Baadshah to oppose him.

name: Blown Away
summary_text: Teenage beauty tries to convince her new boyfriend that her father murdered her mother and that he should die too.

name: Racing with the Moon
summary_text: In 1942 California, two young men await induction into the U.S. Marines and say goodbye to their girlfriends.

name: Ceremony
summary_text: Two friends are off on a weekend outing. Marshall thinks the trip is to re-establish their friendship, but Sam has ulterior motives in mind as he crashes the wedding of a woman he still loves.

name: Bes Vakit
summary_text: A small, poor village leaning over high rocky mountains, facing the immense sea, flanked by olive yards. Villagers are simple and diligent people who struggle to cope with a harsh nature. ...                See full summary »

name: Love Jones
summary_text: Darius Lovehall is a young black poet in Chicago who starts dating Nina Mosley, a beautiful and talented photographer. While trying to figure out if they've got a "love thing" or are just "...                See full summary »

name: The Pumaman
summary_text: Thousands of years ago, aliens visited Earth and fathered the Pumaman, a man-god with supernatural powers entrusted by a gold mask with the ability to control people's minds, which in present-day London, falls upon the wrong hands.

name: Buck Privates
summary_text: Two sidewalk salesman enlist in the army in order to avoid jail, only to find that their drill instructor is the police officer who tried having them imprisoned.

name: Dracula 3D
summary_text: Asia Argento stars in horror legend Dario Argento's sexy spin on the classic tale about the sharp-toothed count who craves human blood.

name: Children of the Damned
summary_text: Six impossibly intelligent children from all over the world with dangerous psychic powers hide in a church in England after the military tries to experiment on them. Besieged, they warn the military to back off before carnage ensues.

name: Raincoat
summary_text: All he wanted was to see her just once. Manu was from a village in the backwoods. Neeru was the girl next door, his lost love.

name: Vesnicko má stredisková
summary_text: Comedy about the people who inhabit a small town. For years the overbearing Pavek has endured Otik, the "town idiot," sharing his meals and the front seat of their dump truck. But Otik is ...                See full summary »

name: Good Boy
summary_text: An intergalactic dog pilot from Sirius (the dog star), visits Earth to verify the rumors that dogs have failed to take over the planet.

name: Arsenal
summary_text: A Southern mobster attempts to rescue his kidnapped brother.

name: They're Watching
summary_text: The renovation of an old house in a village somewhere in Eastern Europe will bring the crew of an American home improvement TV show up against superstitions, misunderstandings and bloody violence.

name: Drive Thru
summary_text: Horror gets Super Sized when Horny The Clown, the demonic mascot of "Hella-Burger," starts slashing Orange County teenagers with his meat cleaver from Hell.

name: Donald Trump's The Art of the Deal: The Movie
summary_text: Funny or Die presents a satirical rendition of Donald Trump's 1987 best selling business book, The Art of the Deal.

name: Suburban Gothic
summary_text: City-boy Raymond returns to his hometown and finds a vengeful ghost is terrorizing his house. Therefore, this man-child recruits Becca, a badass local bartender, to solve the mystery of the spirit threatening people's lives.

name: Water and Fire
summary_text: A pretty young girl falls for an enigmatic, shy man who sweeps her off her feet. She becomes pregnant but is not allowed to tell him. His advisers are adamant. Back home, they have set up a...                See full summary »

name: Inja bedoone man
summary_text: The story is about the world of a small family with familiar dreams and not so remarkable problems. The mother is trying to lead everything to save her family, but small events disarrange all her plans.

name: The Return of Martin Guerre
summary_text: In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.
